sense.name: Physically add something to another substance.
sense.examples: Instill 5 drops in the eye every 4-6 hours. The gas guzzling cars instilled the air with increasing levels of carbon monoxide.

sense.name: Transmit knowledge or emotion to another.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] INSTILL NP2[patient] PP{P NP[recipient]}
sense.examples: She hoped to instill certain virtues in the children. Her presence instilled faith in the congregation. The teacher instilled a love of music in the children.
